string.value: I think I just saw a Fashionable lady, #p9270032# in CBD waiving her hands at me! Am I that Attractive?

#p9270032# has asked me to gather #b#t4000035##k and #b#t4000021##k in order to make a fashionable brand new Indian Costume.

#t4000035# #r#c4000035#/20#k
#t4000021# #r#c4000021#/20#k

Now that I have brought all the required items to #p9270032#, I never have seen someboy so obssessed with her fashion that much. Talking about the fashion, there is no one that dresses better than me in MapleS.E.A.
Why are all the dresses in Singapore so beautiful?

You... yes! Stop looking around, it's you! Are you the local of this island? I bet you are~ I was wondering, why mostly all the dresses in Singapore are so beautiful? Especially the traditional ones from the 3 Major races on the island!

While I was doing some window shopping around CBD, and I saw a superior tailor making a very beautiful dress! I asked him, and he told me that this dress originates from the traditional Indian Custom. I asked him to make me one of the dresses, but he told me that he is unable to do so. Sob~
He will need #b20 #t4000035##k and #b20 #t4000021##k to make a whole new Indian Costume if I am interested in it. By the way, can you help me to find all these materials?

I knew you were going to say YES! I can tell by the way you dress.... You fashionable mapler! Cool~ Please get me #b20 #t4000035##k and #b20 #t4000021##k for the tailor to make a whole new Indian Costume.
I knew you were going to say no.... you know why? YOU GOT NO STLYE AT ALL! You don't understand the fashion...
Where could I find extra leathers and tablecloths? Do you have any idea?
Woot! That's fast! I can't imagine seeing myself with the Indian Costume on me! How gorgeous can I be now~ Hohoho!
Thanks... Hopefully, I will be able to get the new clothes and become a Fashion leader in Singapore!
Ehh... I don't think you have the materials I need for the dress. Please get me #b20 #t4000035##k and #b20 #t4000021##k
